entries.meaning: The process or act of granting recognition to a degree from a foreign university.
The expropriation of foreign owned capital to domestic persons.
examples: It was such acts of expropriating foreign-owned property—or what was called nostrification  in  postimperial  Central  Europe  when  the  property was given to private nationals—that Hayek complained of in The Road  to  Serfdom.
